General.Name: DMC Mining Ltd
General.Description: DMC Mining Limited focuses on identifying, acquiring, and developing prospective nickel, copper, gold, and other base metal assets in Western Australia. It holds 100% interests in the Ravensthorpe Nickel project, which consists of 1 granted tenement covering an area of approximately 61 square kilometers located in the Esperance region, Western Australia; and the Fraser Range project that includes 10 granted tenements covering an area of approximately 873 square kilometers located in the Albany-Fraser Orogen, Western Australia. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 44 St Georges Terrace, Perth, WA, Australia, 6000
